item.title: Institutions
item.description: Institutions International Incorporated Research Institutions for Seismology (IRIS) IRIS Data Services IRIS Data Management Center (DMC) International Seismological Centre (ISC) Global Earthquake Model Foundation University NAVSTAR Consortium (UNAVCO): a non-profit university-governed consortium, facilitates geoscience research and education using geodesy Seafloor Geodesy Regional 中国地震局 中国地震台网中心 European Plate Observing System (EPOS): EPOS Thematic Core Services (EPOS-TCS) EPOS seismology Observatories & Research
